participant_2.background:
I was able to combine my passion for music and my career when I started my own indie band.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
I remember listening to Marduk with my friends in the basement.
my mom taught me how to play the cello.
I worked as a server at a restaurant before getting my current job.

content.text: I have been thinking about my favorite artist, Bob Ross. I love his style.
I love Bob Ross too. I wish I could paint like him.
You could always take some lessons. I think that would be a lot of fun.
I would love to but I don't have much time. I work full time and I have a band that I am in.
Oh that's cool. What kind of music do you play?
We're an indie band. We play a lot of original music.
That's awesome. I love listening to indie music.
We're actually pretty good. We're working on getting our music out there.
Good luck with that. I'm sure you'll do great.
What else do you like to do?
I really like spending time outdoors. I like to go hiking and camping.
That sounds like fun. I wish I could go camping more often.
It's always a good time. I love being in nature.
I know what you mean. I love taking a break from everything and just being in the moment.
I'm glad we have something in common.
